#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        if(n<3)
            cout<<1<<endl;
        else
        {
            int x=ceil(log10(2*M_PI*n)/2+n*log10(n/exp(1)));
            cout<<x<<endl;
        }

    }

    return 0;
}
